00032 class SoVRMLMaterialP;
00033 
00034 class COIN_DLL_API SoVRMLMaterial : public SoNode
00035 {
00036   typedef SoNode inherited;
00037   SO_NODE_HEADER(SoVRMLMaterial);
00038 
00039 public:
00040   static void initClass(void);
00041   SoVRMLMaterial(void);
00042 
00043   SoSFColor diffuseColor;
00044   SoSFFloat ambientIntensity;
00045   SoSFColor specularColor;
00046   SoSFColor emissiveColor;
00047   SoSFFloat shininess;
00048   SoSFFloat transparency;
00049 
00050   virtual void doAction(SoAction * action);
00051   virtual void GLRender(SoGLRenderAction * action);
00052   virtual void callback(SoCallbackAction * action);
00053 
00054 protected:
00055   virtual ~SoVRMLMaterial();
00056 
00057 private:
00058   SoVRMLMaterialP * pimpl;
00059 }; // class SoVRMLMaterial
